title: Cringe alert! Golf's most awkward photo shoots
headline: Cringe alert! Golf's most awkward photo shoots
description: It's the fall season, which means another awkward photo shoot opportunity. Dustin Johnson, Hideki Matsuyama and others join our gallery of head-scratching, cringe-inducing shoots that already includes Michelle Wie, Paulina Gretzky, Tiger and more.
short_headline: Cringe alert! Golf's most awkward photo shoots
body: It's the fall season, which means another awkward photo shoot opportunity. Dustin Johnson, Hideki Matsuyama and others join our gallery of head-scratching, cringe-inducing shoots that already includes Michelle Wie, Paulina Gretzky, Tiger and more.
